### canonicalizeDwarfOperations() {#ade8a5e3b6a082e4cb8bb4202ae7f652a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static SmallVector&lt; uint64&#95;t &gt; canonicalizeDwarfOperations (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; uint64&#95;t &gt; WorkingOps)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
This function will canonicalize:

<ul>
<li>DW&#95;OP&#95;plus&#95;uconst to DW&#95;OP&#95;constu &lt;const-val&gt; DW&#95;OP&#95;plus</li>
<li>DW&#95;OP&#95;lit&lt;n&gt; to DW&#95;OP&#95;constu &lt;n&gt;</li>
</ul>
